3.text: Trim your asparagus to remove the woody ends of the stalks.

5.text: Line a rimmed cookie sheet with aluminum foil.

6.text: Roll the asparagus spears in olive oil to coat them.

7.text: Arrange the asparagus spears in a single layer on the pan.

8.text: Sprinkle the asparagus spears with salt and pepper, and other seasonings to taste.

9.text: Place the pan of asparagus spears in the preheated oven.

10.text: Take them out of the oven.

12.text: Serve roasted asparagus spears warm or at room temperature.
